Class Repartition

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.operations.Repartition

    RepartitionTemporal

    public class Repartition
extends Object
    Creates an index on an input file
    Author:
    Ahmed Eldawy

    • Method Detail

      • calculateNumberOfPartitions

        public static int calculateNumberOfPartitions(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                              long inFileSize,
                              org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem outFs,
                              org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outFile,
                              long blockSize)
        Calculates number of partitions required to index the given file.
        Parameters:
        conf - The current configuration which can contain user-defined parameters
        inFileSize - The size of the input file in bytes
        outFs - The output file system where the index will be written
        outFile - The path of the output file which is used to get the output block size.
        blockSize - If set, this will override the default output block size.
        Returns:
        The number of blocks needed to write the index file

      • repartitionMapReduce

        @Deprecated
public static void repartitionMapReduce(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inFile,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outPath,
                                   Shape stockShape,
                                   long blockSize,
                                   String sindex,
                                   boolean overwrite)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        InterruptedException
        Deprecated. 
        Repartitions a file that is already in HDFS. It runs a MapReduce job that partitions the file into cells, and writes each cell separately.
        Parameters:
        inFile - The input raw file that needs to be indexed.
        outPath - The output path where the index will be written.
        stockShape - An instance of the shapes stored in the input file.
        blockSize - The block size for the constructed index.
        sindex - The type of index to build.
        overwrite - Whether to overwrite the output or not.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception happens while preparing the job.
        InterruptedException - If the underlying MapReduce job was interrupted.

      • repartitionMapReduce

        public static void repartitionMapReduce(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inFile,
                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outPath,
                        CellInfo[] cellInfos,
                        OperationsParams params)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        InterruptedException
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • repartitionMapReduce

        public static void repartitionMapReduce(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inFile,
                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outPath,
                        Shape stockShape,
                        long blockSize,
                        CellInfo[] cellInfos,
                        String sindex,
                        boolean overwrite)
                                 throws IOException
        Repartitions an input file according to the given list of cells.
        Parameters:
        inFile - The input raw file that needs to be indexed.
        outPath - The output path where the index will be written.
        stockShape - An instance of the shapes stored in the input file.
        blockSize - The block size for the constructed index.
        cellInfos - A predefined set of cells to use as a global index
        sindex - The type of index to build.
        overwrite - Whether to overwrite the output or not.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception happens while preparing the job.

      • repartitionLocal

        @Deprecated
public static <S extends Shape> void repartitionLocal(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path in,
                                                 org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path out,
                                                 S stockShape,
                                                 long blockSize,
                                                 CellInfo[] cells,
                                                 String sindex,
                                                 boolean overwrite)
                             throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Repartitions a file on local machine without MapReduce jobs.
        Parameters:
        in - The input raw file that needs to be indexed.
        out - The output path where the index will be written.
        stockShape - An instance of the shapes stored in the input file.
        blockSize - The block size for the constructed index.
        cells - A predefined set of cells to use as a global index
        sindex - The type of index to build.
        overwrite - Whether to overwrite the output or not.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception happens while preparing the job. This method is @deprecated. Please use the method repartitionLocal(Path, Path, CellInfo[], OperationsParams)

      • repartition

        public static void repartition(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inFile,
               org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath,
               OperationsParams params)
                        throws IOException,
                               InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        inFile - The input raw file that needs to be indexed.
        outputPath - The output path where the index will be written.
        params - The parameters and configuration of the underlying job
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception happens while preparing the job.
        InterruptedException - If the underlying MapReduce job was interrupted.

      • printUsage

        protected static void printUsage()

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Entry point to the operation. shape:<s> the shape to use. Automatically inferred from input file if not set. sindex<index> Type of spatial index to build cells-of:<filename> Use the cells of the given file for the global index. blocksize:<size> Size of each block in indexed file in bytes. -local: If set, the index is built on the local machine. input filename: Input file in HDFS output filename: Output file in HDFS
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments
        Throws:
        Exception - If any exception happens while the job is running
